}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "LPC0052 REV:4.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. Loopcomm is the presumed OEM. Probable F7:7B:8C OUI
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.ampedwireless.com/datasheets/Amped_UA1000_Datasheet_LR.pdf Datasheet] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/31737-amped-wireless-adds-pair-o-directional-usb-adapters Amped Wireless Adds Pair O' Directional USB Adapters - SmallNetBuilder]
